sentence: NOW WATCH: Herschel Walker argues with reporter Trump 'never said' election was stolen
title: GOP candidates deemed ineligible as massive signature fraud scandal upends Michigan gubernatorial race

sentence: In Georgia's U.S. Senate race, Herschel Walker, the former University of Georgia football star who was also recruited by Mr. Trump, won the Republican nomination and will face Senator Raphael Warnock, a Democrat, in November.
title: Primary Elections Live Updates: Voters Reject Trump Endorsed Candidates in Georgia
